item.title: About
item.description:
ğŸ“’ I am an undergraduate student at Technical University of Eindhoven, majoring in Computer Science looking for an internship

ğŸš™ Born in Moscow; currently based in Eindhoven, Netherlands

ğŸ“š I am creating a search engine for learning any topic on Earth with mind maps

ğŸš€ With it, I want to accelerate the way in which people learn by providing the most efficient paths to learn any topic on Earth

The search engine searches through an open database of community curated mind maps

ğŸ–‹ I also love writing. You can read all that I have said on Medium or search for the article you want, perhaps I have written about it

ğŸ’¡ Aside from this, I am creating a social platform to help nurture and grow ideas with the help of community

ğŸ† I am looking for internship and work opportunites for this Summer of 2017 and onwards in web or mobile development. My CV can be found online

ğŸ“§ If you are interested in hiring me, please email me

ğŸŒ I often share my thoughts on Twitter. I share my code and knowledge on GitHub and you can see the infrequent photos I take on Instagram.

ğŸ€ If you want to know even more about me, you can explore my own personal mind map or even search through it, if you like

ğŸ’› You can support what I do on Patreon, Thank you

ğŸ’¬ Feel free to ask me any question you have

  • I want to minimise the time it takes to come up with an interesting question to ask and solve
